message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
I'm going to propose a 60-40 split in my favor.  It's a fair reflection of my superior negotiating skills!  😉
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect too much 😊
I'm willing to concede a bit, but I still believe a 55-45 split is the fairest.  We both need to be flexible to reach an agreement.
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but don't think I'll give up too much 😏
